data: Initiate appropriate cardiology inpatient admission orders if patient is to be admitted
For outpatients taking metFORMIN prior to procedure and with a eGFR of less than 45 mL/min prior to catheterization, provide patient with lab requisition for serum creatinine

q15min for 1 h, q30min for 1 h, q1h for 4 h, q4h for 16 h, then as per routine guidelines
q15min for 1 h, q30min for 1 h, q1h for 4 h, q4h for 16 h, then as per routine guidelines if hemostasis is achieved (i.e. no active bleeding)
Assess and remove as per nursing practice standard
Assess and remove as per nursing practice standard
Remove central line(s) and invasive hemodynamic monitoring lines 1 h after the procedure if hemodynamically stable
Remove as soon as possible if urine output greater than 30 mL/h for 6 h
If vascular access (groin) site stable for 4 h
